item.title: Skill cape problem. no level needed?
item.dc:creator: @Morgarath Morgarath
item.description:
@Morgarath wrote:

OK. Its me again.

Im trying to get this code to make it so you need 99 to wear a attack cape:

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073) {// Evan`
        
        if (playerLevel[0] <= 98 && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073) { // If you are lvl 98 or lower you cannot wear cape!
            remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], 1);
            sendMessage("You Need 99 attack To Wear This Cape!");
        }

I can wear the attack cape still, but it occasinally will take it off and say “you need 99 attack” bla bla… but you can just click on it again and weild it… I DONT WANT THAT.

Read full topic
item.source: Skill cape problem. no level needed?
